overview: What if, on one of the WORST days of your life,  a guy showed up, NASTY AS HELL, started acting INCREDIBLY, and HYPNOTIZED everyone around you?  And WHAT IF that NASTY DUDE attacked you like an animal and you woke up days later as the prime suspect in some murders because GUESS WHAT?  He looks JUST LIKE YOU.
tagline: A DANGEROUS EXPERIMENT GOES NUTS.  A LOSER'S LIFE FALLS APART. A DANCE FREAK RUNS WILD!
title: Dance Freak
